channel.title: You have only just left another world
channel.description:
well im stuck and i need your help :eek:
as you can see i can make "you have only just left another world"" load but i don't know how to make it connect i was thinking maybe add timer/delay in [code]public void run() { [/code] so when the timer got to 0 it would carry on with the connection but as it is it just goes in a loop and im not sure of how to stop this loop or maybe there better way :rolleyes: post here if you think you can help me out
here what i got so far [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img260.imageshack.us/img260/5714/onosko3.png[/img][/URL] Shot at 2007-08-20

item.title: You have only just left another world
item.dc:creator: @awesom awesom
item.description:
@awesom wrote:

Oh OK, But there are already ways to stop SYI that work you know.

Read full topic

item.title: You have only just left another world
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Check the login packet. After the ISAAC handling, the final numbers sent should be a 1 (direct login), playerRights (0 preferably), and 0 (forget why now, but it is needed.)

Read full topic

item.title: You have only just left another world
item.dc:creator: @lostandfound lostandfound
item.description:
@lostandfound wrote:

[quote=“awesom, post:6, topic:135246”]No offense but why would you want that anyway…? Do you have your OWN separate worlds? If you do then sweet and all but if you don’t it seems pretty pointless.

Sorry I don’t know how to fix either.[/quote]
we’re trying to add timer to logg in screen so you dont get massed with those anti syipkpker

Read full topic
